Title: "Hotel Search and Filter: A Comprehensive Guide and Examples"

score": 1.0,         "HotelId": "11",         "HotelName": "Regal Orb Resort & Spa",         "Tags": [             "free wifi",             "restaurant",             "24-hour front desk service"         ]     }, Example 5: Range filtersPOST /indexes/hotels-sample-index/docs/search?api-version=2020-06-30 { Response for this query should look similar to the following example, trimmed forbrevity.
JSONThe next query is a range filter over a string field (Address/StateProvince):HTTPResponse for this query should look similar to the example below, trimmed for brevity.
In this example, it's not possible to sort by StateProvince because the field isn'tattributed as "sortable" in the index definition.    "search": "*",     "filter": "Rating ge 2 and Rating lt 4",     "select": "HotelId, HotelName, Rating",     "orderby": "Rating desc",     "count": true } "@odata.count": 27, "value": [     {         "@search. score": 1.0,         "HotelId": "22",         "HotelName": "Stone Lion Inn",         "Rating": 3.9     },     {         "@search.score": 1.0,         "HotelId": "25",         "HotelName": "Scottish Inn",         "Rating": 3.8     },     {         "@search.score": 1.0,         "HotelId": "2",        "HotelName": "Twin Dome Motel",         "Rating": 3.
